message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Can we discuss a price closer to $90?
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would it be possible to reach an agreement around $95?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! However, I've got to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product. How about we meet at $108?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. Based on my budget, could we possibly agree on $100 for the product?
I'm almost there, Bob! I think we can get closer to a deal. How about we meet at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to selling the product for $105?
I'm running out of rounds, Bob, but I'm not ready to give up yet! I think we can squeeze out a bit more. How about we meet at $115?
Hello Alice, I'm grateful for your efforts to accommodate my budget. I believe we can finalize this transaction at $110.
